header.tagline: Senior Estimator - Expert in Civil & Infrastructure Projects

summary: Accomplished estimator in civil infrastructure with 15+ years' experience in managing budgets and increasing project efficiency. Successfully increased project efficiency by 18% and managed BOQs of 20,000+ sq ft area.

bullets.text: Provided comprehensive quantity surveying services to civil construction and real estate companies, increasing project efficiency by 18%.
Performed detailed analysis of tendering documents to align project estimates with budgetary constraints, enhancing project efficiency by 18%.
Prepared accurate Bill of Quantities (BOQ) for various high-value projects including residential and commercial properties.
Managed cost estimating for design variations, consistently limiting budget overruns to less than 5%.
Generated commercial offers and tender documents that resulted in a 30% increase in successful bids.
Executed quantity take-off for comprehensive project domains: architectural, structural, interior design, earthworks, and more.
Contributed to high-profile projects including LDS Temple Complex series in Brazil, managing BOQs of 20,000+ sq ft area.

experience.company: Civil Infrastructure Group — Greater Melbourne Area, VIC
experience.title: Senior Estimator / Quantity Surveyor

bullets.text: Conducted rigorous tender analysis for major infrastructure projects, streamlining project initiation by 25%.
Delivered precise BOQs including material, labor, and equipment lists, optimizing resource allocation.
Collaborated with clients like Zinfra Pty Ltd, resulting in over $3.5M in project awards.
Streamlined cost consulting, achieving a cost-saving of 12% in material procurement.
Initiated program schedules reducing project completion time by 15%.
Innovated construction methods to meet budget goals, improving contractor relations.
Responsible for detailed analysis of tender documents, increasing accuracy of project cost foresight by 20%.
Executed final BOQs for major commercial projects valued at over $24.0M.
Facilitated team meetings clarifying project scopes, reducing project blockers by 30%.

additionalExperience: Includes membership with CAU BR Council of Architecture and ongoing specializations on construction management.
